execution_quality: System correctly reported unknown skill error; user then retried with same command in next message.
work_category: User attempting to invoke 'commit' skill which is not recognized by the system.
summary: System error prevented skill invocation, and no alternative action or guidance was provided. User repeated the same command without resolution, indicating the error was not properly handled or explained.
follow_up_pattern: User repeated the same command, suggesting either persistence or lack of understanding that the skill was unavailable.
